EmailTemplate.name: Thank you for choosing Astrum Solar (1417394822.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for choosing Astrum Solar (1417394822.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly: - - - - Clean Clean false false false false EN-US ZH-TW AR-SA Mr. Newark- I just wanted to take a moment to thank you for choosing Astrum Solar for your home solar installation. We know you have many choices for an installer, so we are honored that you selected us. We are excited to welcome you as our newest customer in Douglas. I understand that you were a referral from Janet Rivard, so the next time you have a chance to speak with her, please convey our thanks to her as well. Neil will take good care of you as the process unfolds, but if I can be of any assistance to you, please do not hesitate to reach out. Hope you had a great holiday week, and thanks again. Jose <http://www.astrumsolar.com/> Jose RamosChief Marketing OfficerP 707.495.8049 <tel:707.495.8049>F 855.850.3351 <tel:855.850.3351>E jose.ramos@astrumsolar.com <mailto:jose.ramos@astrumsolar.com>6200 Stoneridge Mall Road, Suite 300Pleasanton, CA 94588www.astrumsolar.com <http://www.astrumsolar.com/>
